publications.title: Lighter and Faster - A Guide to the Svelte Framework

opengraph.description: Let’s learn the Svelte framework by walking through creating a common log-in form used by virtually every type of application.

publications.title: Machine Learning Number Recognition - From Zero to Application

opengraph.description: This article demonstrates how you can create an app capable of recognizing handwritten digits in under an hour, using Python and React.
opengraph.ogDescription: Machine learning and computer vision are not new concepts, yet the availability of new tools and datasets is bringing them to a wider audience. Here is how you can create an app capable of recognizing handwritten digits in less than an hour. #ML #MachineLearning #ComputerVision
opengraph.ogTitle: Machine Learning Digit Recognition Tutorial | Toptal®

publications.title: The Best React State Management Tools for Enterprise Applications

opengraph.description: Is Redux still the go-to solution for React state management in enterprise apps, or can alternatives like Recoil and MobX unseat it?
opengraph.ogDescription: State management is important in any React project, but it is crucial in enterprise-level applications. Here’s how the most popular React state management tools compare in an enterprise setting.
opengraph.ogTitle: React State Management Tools for Enterprise Applications | Toptal®

opengraph.ogTitle: Demystifying Debugging With React Developer Tools | Toptal®
